item.title: About Me
item.description: Mike Gonzalez Software Engineer since 2000: I've been a bored (also boring, I guess...) Java developer for many many years. I made my job, without caring my methodology or skills. I wasn't concerned about doing my job with professionalism neither enthusiasm. Father of two incredible kids: Adri√† and Claudia. Runner and free athlete: I think we should care also our body and health, as we care our mind and skills.
